alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Cobb; Coweta; DeKalb; Fayette; Henry; North Fulton; Rockdale; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 2:51PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Rockdale, DeKalb, Fayette, southern Cobb, northwestern Henry, eastern Coweta, south central Fulton and Clayton Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 250 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Fair Oaks to Panthersville to near Thomas Crossroads, and moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Marietta, Decatur, Fayetteville, Jonesboro, City of South Fulton, Sandy Springs, Smyrna, Dunwoody, Peachtree City, East Point, Stockbridge, Union City, Forest Park, Riverdale, College Park, Powder Springs, Fairburn, Chamblee, and Doraville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: Clayton; Cobb; Coweta; DeKalb; Fayette; Henry; North Fulton; Rockdale; South Fulton
